title: Kindaichi Shounen No Jikenbo - Tanpenshuu
alternative_title: 「金田一少年の事件簿」短編集 ; 金田一少年の事件簿 短編集 ; Challenges of Young Kindaichi - Collected Special Short Files ; Young Kindaichi's Casebook Special ; Young Kindaichi’s Casebook: Short Stories
status: 「金田一少年の事件簿」短編集 ; 金田一少年の事件簿 短編集 ; Challenges of Young Kindaichi - Collected Special Short Files ; Young Kindaichi's Casebook Special ; Young Kindaichi’s Casebook: Short Stories
description:
Description :
        Lazy, unmotivated and sometimes pervertic kindaichi is a high school student with an IQ of 180! His grandfather was one of the best and most famous detectives in his time and kindaichi carries with him the responsibility of living up to his grandfather's name. In this series he takes on several mystery/ murder cases, accompanied by his best friend/ childhood friend miyuki. Keep your eyes open for subtle clues and hidden meanings and try to solve them before kindaichi does! One of the most iconic mystery manga the rest of us grew up with.
